He has a role in the as-yet unreleased [[short subject|short film]] [http://www.thesummerhousefilm.com/ ''The Summer House''], and the films [http://www.howtobemovie.com/ ''How To Be''], and ''Little Ashes'' (in which he plays [[Salvador Dali]]). He is attached to star in vampire film ''After Dark''. He appears advertising campaign for [[Hackett (clothing store)|Hackett]]'s Autumn 2007 collection.
He has a role in the as-yet unreleased [[short subject|short film]] [http://www.thesummerhousefilm.com/ ''The Summer House''], and the films [http://www.howtobemovie.com/ ''How To Be''], and ''Little Ashes'' (in which he plays [[Salvador Dali]]). He is attached to star in vampire film ''After Dark''. He appears advertising campaign for [[Hackett (clothing store)|Hackett]]'s Autumn 2007 collection.
â
On December 11th, 2007, Summit Entertainment announced that Pattinson will play [[Edward Cullen (Twilight)|Edward Cullen]], the sexiest vampire alive, in the upcoming movie ''[[Twilight (novel)|Twilight]]'' based on [[Stephenie Meyer]]'s bestselling vampire/human romance of the same name.
+
On December 11th, 2007, Summit Entertainment announced that Pattinson will play [[Edward Cullen (Twilight)|Edward Cullen]] in the upcoming movie ''[[Twilight (novel)|Twilight]]'' based on [[Stephenie Meyer]]'s bestselling vampire/human romance of the same name.
